title: Implement divide function in src/math.js
description: Implement the divide(a, b, precision) function. It should return a/b rounded to the specified precision (default 2). Handle division by zero by returning Infinity.

title: Implement divide function
description: Implement divide(a, b, precision=2) in src/math.js. Return a/b rounded to precision decimal places. Division by zero should return Infinity.
